Observed at: St. Lawrence 1:30 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 0.2°C
Wind: ESE 43 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain or snow. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening then changing to rain after midnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 this evening then becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Rain or drizzle ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Rain beginning in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain at times mixed with snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
